value.title: Let's Talk Paginated Reports In Power BI (Premium)
value.excerpt: Join us live as we talk about where Paginated Reports in Power BI fit in. There is a place for paginated reports and you may not be aware of it!  游닉 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************  Want to take your Power BI skills to the next level? We have training courses available

value.title: LEVEL UP Power BI Conditional Drill with Paginated reports!
value.excerpt: Take Power BI Conditional Drill to the next level by incorporating Paginated reports with your strategy! Patrick shows a customer scenario that he solved using this approach.  Paginated reports doc: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/paginated-reports/paginated-reports-report-builder-power-bi  Power

value.title: Link from a Power BI Paginated report to a Power BI report
value.excerpt: Patrick looks at how you can add a link to your Power BI Paginated report and open a Power BI report while passing filters over to explore data.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube -- http://www.facebook.com/guyinacube -- Snapchat - guyinacube --

value.title: Making sense of the Power BI Premium Gen2 Metrics App
value.excerpt: Struggling ramping up on the Power BI Premium Gen2 Metrics App? Adam walks through the app to help you install it and navigate to get the most value. Some great stuff in the latest update!  Install the Gen2 metrics app https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/power-bi/admin/service-premium-install-gen2-app

value.title: Migrate your Paginated reports to Power BI
value.excerpt: Are your paginated reports still on-premises with either Power BI Report Server or SQL Server Reporting Services? Want to move them to Power BI? Patrick shows you how you can do that using the RDLMigration tool!  Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/guidance/migrate-ssrs-reports-to-power-bi
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/_VaBzheAgxY" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Natives Queries or ODBC with Incremental Refresh in Power BI
value.excerpt: Are you wanting to use Incremental Refresh in Power BI but need to use ODBC, native queries or something that doesn't fold properly? Adam shows you a solution for Power BI Desktop and Power BI dataflows!  Native Queries https://docs.microsoft.com/power-query/native-database-query  Using Incremental Refresh

value.title: New Artificial Intelligence capabilities in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: Power BI Desktop has new Artificial Intelligence (AI) capabilities in the November 2019 release. Sarina Stevens shows us what it is all about! value.title: 'OraOLEDB.Oracle' provider is not registered

value.title: Paginated URL Parameters

value.title: Power BI and Microsoft Flow - Monitoring your data
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick shows how you can use Microsoft Flow, combined with Power BI, to monitor data and alert you when something is available.  This takes advantage of a streaming dataset and using the schedule recurrence in Microsoft Flow to trigger an action as Patrick wasn't using anything else to

value.title: Power BI Desktop And Role-Playing Dimensions: Can you do it?
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick talks about Power BI Desktop and role-playing dimensions. Can you even do this in Power BI Desktop? Patrick shows you why one particular way is not recommended as it will cause trouble. And then show you how you can use DAX within Power BI Desktop to take this to the next level.

Patrick also shows the new group functionality in the May 2018 release of Power BI Desktop.  KillaDBA - Migration Plan song - https://youtu.be/c2R7oMW2u0w   LET'S CONNECT!  KillaDBA - Twitter:

value.title: Power BI DirectQuery and SQL Databases: A Conversation with Bob Ward
value.excerpt: Power BI DirectQuery can have performance implications. Bob Ward shares his knowledge to help make SQL Databases perform better!  Automatic tuning: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/sql-database/sql-database-automatic-tuning  ColumnStore Indexes: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/sql-database/sql-database-in-memory

value.title: Power BI Drillthrough Updates
value.excerpt: Did you know there were Power BI drillthrough updates? In this video, Patrick looks at the drillthrough updates in Power BI Desktop. This includes Keep All Filters which will pass the filters on your parent page to the drillthrough page.   LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube

value.title: Power BI Paginated Reports: Visualizing Data
value.excerpt: Paginated reports in Power BI are now available. Now that you have data, Patrick walks you through how to build a matrix visual within the report. He also looks at how to work with expressions and formatting.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube --

images.title: Power BI Paginated Reports: Visualizing Data

value.title: Power BI parameters - Updating in the Power BI Service or with APIs
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at how you can update Power BI parameters within the service or by using APIs. You can create Power BI Parameters within Power BI Desktop using Power Query. Then you can update those Power BI parameters once the report is published to the Power BI service.  PowerShell Samples:
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/MJVSu47iMmo" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Power BI URL Filter Updates (August 2018)
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick looks at the recent updates to using the Power BI URL Filter. The update to using URL Filter parameters in Power BI include updates to operators along with the ability to use more than strings and spaces in table names!   Blog: https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/power-bi-report-url-filter-improvements/

value.title: Tracing with Log Analytics and Power BI
value.excerpt: With Log Analytics integration in Power BI, you can now capture Analysis Services trace events easily and over a longer period of time.
